presets.name: Run Android for the current device architecture
Lists all available Android devices and simulators

appId.description: Specify an `applicationId` to launch after build. If not specified, `package` from `AndroidManifest.xml` will be used.

appIdSuffix.description: Specify an `applicationIdSuffix` to launch after build.

mainActivity.description: Name of the activity to start.

deviceId.description: Builds your app and starts it on a specific device/simulator with the given device id (listed by running `adb devices` on the command line).

listDevices.description: Lists all available Android devices and simulators and let you choose one to run the app

binaryPath.description: Path relative to project root where pre-built .apk binary lives.

port.description: The port where the packager server is listening on.

tasks.description: Run custom Gradle tasks. By default it's "assembleDebug". Will override passed mode and variant arguments.

activeArchOnly.description: Build native libraries only for the current device architecture for debug builds.

extraParams.description: Custom params passed to gradle build command

interactive.description: Explicitly select build type and flavour to use before running a build
